titleStmt.title: Devotions of the ancient church in seaven pious prayers with seaven administrations. Collected for a private use, and now at the desire of some judicious persons, made publick.
titleStmt.author: Bernard, Nicholas, d. 1661.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for R. Royston, at the Angel in Ivy-lane.,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Nicholas Bernard by Wing.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
